title: Announcement, Commercial Art: Illustration, Graphic and Industrial Design, 1988
title_raw: Commercial Art: Illustration, Graphic and Industrial Design
signed: Signature imprinted in black, verso, across right edge, center, ruuning upward, sideways: : Design: Edward Fella, back out way out west
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across upper right quadrant: CORNEA/ EXTERNAL/ VIEW OF; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: DETROIT/ FOCUS; running downward, sideways: GALLERY/ 643 Beaubien, 3rd Floor Detroit, Michigan 48226; diagonally across lower left quadrant, running upward: Gallery Hours:/ Wednesday-Saturday/ Noon-6 p.m.; across lower left corner: (313) 962-9025; across lower edge: Also in the area: SURREALISM, Detroit Artists Market opening, 5-7:30 pm
Verso: Imprinted in black across left edge, running upward, sideways: DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY ART OPENING: FRIDAY, OCTOBER 14 5- 8:30 PM OCTOBER 14 -NOVEMBER 11 1988/ COMMERCIAL ART: ILLUSTRATION, GRAPHIC AND INDUSTRIAL DESIGN/ with the support of:/ The National Endowment for the Arts/ the Michigan Council for the Arts/ The Detroit Council for the Arts/ EDWARD FELLA/ CHUCK GILLIES/ JAMES A. HOUFF/ JONATHAN R. TEASDALE; across upper right quadrant: OCTOBER 12 -NOVEMBER 11/ COMMERCIAL ART:/ ILLUSTRATION./ GRAPHIC AND/ INDUSTRIAL DESIGN/ EDWARD FELLA/ CHUCK GILLIES/ JAMES A. HOUFF/ JONATHAN R. TEASDALE; across lower left quadrant: Across from the Bricktown People Mover Station/ Detroit Focus/ 743 Beaubien 3rd Floor/ Detroit Michigan 48226; across lower right quadrant: Nonprofit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Detroit, Michigan/ Permit No. 2960
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black, for Detroit Focus Gallery exhibition, designed to be mailed.  Text in a variety of sizes, styles, throughout. 
Recto: Across upper left quadrant, image of globe, two frames of interactions between
two people.  Across upper right quadrant, image of eye.  Across center, right, abstract line drawings, images.  Across lower right quadrant, image of crowd of people walking. 
Verso: Across left edge, text giving exhibition title, dates, reception information, participating artists, sponsors.  Across upper right quadrant, text giving dates, title, participating artists.  Across center, right, eight rows of stylized figures including men, women, children, houses, coins.  Across lower half of sheet, text giving mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Commercial Art: Illustration, Graphic and Industrial Design, 1988. Offset lithograph on tan paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-21
